version_description:
Behold, Looters!

Mighty Quest is now available WORLDWIDE!
The most epic tale of all begins with its very first Season: ROYAL SHADOWS.
As the gates of Opulencia finally open, a mysterious ghost begs you to find our missing King… Will you help him?
(I damn well hope you will)

Among the NEW MARVELS which just landed in Opulencia:
• Slash your way through the EPIC PASS and avenge Lord Logan! Complete unique tasks and earn exclusive and invaluable Loot!
• INAUGURATION GIFTS! The Gates of Opulencia are now open to all looters! Join a special Launch Event to earn super-rare rewards including a unique pet and much much more…
• Prepare for a new kind of thrill with enhanced SOUND and MUSIC along with HAPTIC feedback for the most badass encounters! Feel every sword-swing and critical hit, right in the palm of your hand!

Behold, Looters!

Mighty Quest is now available WORLDWIDE!
The most epic tale of all begins with its very first Season: ROYAL SHADOWS.
As the gates of Opulencia finally open, a mysterious ghost begs you to find our missing King… Will you help him?
(I damn well hope you will)

Among the NEW MARVELS which just landed in Opulencia:
• Slash your way through the EPIC PASS and avenge Lord Logan! Complete unique tasks and earn exclusive and invaluable Loot!
• INAUGURATION GIFTS! The Gates of Opulencia are now open to all looters! Join a special Launch Event to earn super-rare rewards including a unique pet and much much more…
• Prepare for a new kind of thrill with enhanced SOUND and MUSIC along with HAPTIC feedback for the most badass encounters! Feel every sword-swing and critical hit, right in the palm of your hand!

SEASON 5: TOWER OF TIME is live!

A Mysterious Tower just appeared in the Kingdom! It is said that no one succeeded to defeat all the Fallen Champions wandering in it, except for the Prince of Persia and its Dagger of Time!

INCLUDES :
- PRINCE OF PERSIA with his new powerful set!
- BRAND NEW EPIC PASS! Fresh missions, glorious rewards and a NEW PET!
- NEW FEATURE: TOWER OF TIME! Loot Rift keys and climb the leaderboard to obtain exclusive rewards!

Warriorily yours,
Lord McBucket

“SEASON OF THE DRAKES” is live!

As the final showdown draws near, the most ancient protectors of the Epic Loot rise from the Void… starting with SVAROG, the almighty Red Dragon!
Get ready to get roasted as you face your biggest foe EVER!

• NEW EPIC PASS! Slash your way through new quests!
• NEW EPIC ITEMS! Are you ready to feel dragonic?
• DRAGON BANK! Much more valuable than your average Piggy Bank…
• NEW ITEMS! Craft Tonics to boost your power!

Flamingly yours,
Lord McBucket
